mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bug_management (bug_title, level, severity, created_by, created_at, assigned_to, bug_type, status, plan_id, project_id, operating_system, browser, reproduction_steps, attachments) VALUES (#{bugTitle}, #{level}, #{severity}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt}, #{assignedTo}, #{bugType}, #{status}, #{planId}, #{projectId}, #{operatingSystem}, #{browser}, #{reproductionSteps}, #{attachments})
mapper.update: UPDATE bug_management SET bug_title = #{bugTitle}, level = #{level}, severity = #{severity}, assigned_to = #{assignedTo}, bug_type = #{bugType}, status = #{status}, plan_id = #{planId}, project_id = #{projectId}, operating_system = #{operatingSystem}, browser = #{browser}, reproduction_steps = #{reproductionSteps}, attachments = #{attachments} WHERE bug_id = #{bugId}
